org.agreement_technologies.service.tools

Class Graph<N,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.tools.Graph<N,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - Type for the nodes
    E - Type for the edges

    public class Graph<N,E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph class implements a generic graph represented with adjacent lists.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Graph.Adjacent<E>
      Adjacent class implements an adjacent to a node.
